RestPeriod: As needed within and between sets
Progression: Increase hold time or repetitions only after 7 consecutive symptom-free days
Supervision: Initial guidance from a physiotherapist familiar with CFS

HeartRateZone: â‰¤ 40-50% max or below anaerobic threshold
Progression: Add 1-2 minutes of total activity every 1-2 weeks only if no post-exertional malaise occurs
Supervision: Use heart-rate monitor and symptom diary to stay within the energy envelope

Progression: Gradually extend session length to 10 minutes as tolerated
Supervision: Guided by a relaxation app or therapist skilled in pacing strategies
